divs: Sighting DetailsI have been told that this has explainable activity but i can't figure out what. Airplanes don't silently go over my head silently and they sure don't move in one direction stop and do another all silently. I have seen hundreds around my town...please come investigate yourself if you are interested in the scientific process you won't ignore this.
Summary: Please explain to me the activity in this video
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Mankato
